channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: U.S. and Russia agree to observe New START nuclear pact after expiration
item.description: The U.S. and Russia are closing in on a deal to continue to observe the expiring New START arms control treaty beyond its expiration on Thursday, thre...

item.title: Anthropic's newest AI model uncovered 500 zero-day software flaws in testing
item.description: Anthropic's latest AI model has found more than 500 previously unknown high-severity security flaws in open-source libraries with little to no prompti...

item.title: Trump admin green lights rule making it easier to fire thousands of federal employees
item.description: The Trump administration on Thursday announced a new rule to make it easier to fire senior-level civil servants . Why it matters: An estimated 50,000 ...

item.title: Nancy Guthrie update: Detailed timeline, $50K reward and "imposter" ransom arrest
item.description: Law enforcement officials on Thursday provided an updated timeline and new information on the disappearance of Nancy Guthrie , the mother of "Today" s...

item.title: Trump to launch TrumpRx drug discount site. Here's when
item.description: President Trump will announce the launch of the TrumpRx website Thursday night, a Trump adviser told Axios, moving ahead with a plan to offer discount...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Trump to launch TrumpRx.gov, branding his push to lower prescription prices
item.description: The president has argued his drug-pricing initiative ‘should win us the midterms.’ Experts say its impact could be positive but limited.

item.title: Texas special election emboldens Democrats heading into federal midterms
item.description: Races in the Lone Star State are among those that will be key to determining which party controls the U.S. House.

item.title: Slotkin declines DOJ interview request in ‘illegal orders’ video case
item.description: Sen. Elissa Slotkin and other Democratic lawmakers filed a video last year reminding troops that they can ignore illegal orders.

item.title: Border czar Tom Homan says 700 ICE and CBP officers are leaving Minneapolis
item.description: The reduction of ICE officers in Minneapolis is a significant scaling back of Homeland Security’s presence and comes after two U.S. citizens were kill...

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
